column5: Any OFNers had any experience fishing in Jersey? I have 2 weeks of training just outside of New York City at the beginning of November and I was hoping to do some fishing. I hear there are som musky lurking in the area.
Good luck with the training Clive, what are you up to these days?  I would think Fish Head Ric might have an idea or two he might share with you, isn't that the general area he's in now???  Maureen
Sorry can't help ya Clive. Just stay away from a one way charter called Bada Bing and the captains name is Tony. lol  Good Luck in your search!
Hey mepps....PM ALEX....he fishes down there.  Not sure about the musky, but I know he surf fishes the ocean from time to time.

Hey Mepps, was there last year and got out fishing on the ocean.....I took a party boat with a bunch of Buddies from Brick New Jersey.....it was a really great time!!!  We fished for fluke....we ended up with about 20 or so between the 5 of us we also got a ton of small sharks, ocean robins and a couple other types that I didn't know what they were??  It was really cool a couple of Japanese fishermen were with us and they caught a couple of fish and we had fresh sushi right on the boat....make sure to bring your lunch and a bunch of beers and have a blast!!!!  Not too sure about the fresh water fishing??  I know one of my Buddies goes to New York State for bass and musky but not sure how far away you would be to good fishing???  Hope you get out!!!   Chrispy!
Here is a one of the small sharks we got.....   Chrispy!
The Delaware River, Greenwood Lake and Monksville Reservoir all have muskies.
Wuuut up Big Dawg?!!  Give a holla out to FHR.  You could violate the surf together!!  Good look mang!  eh wuut Osama Biddlon

word. Thanks for the info gents!  I have read quite a bit online about NJ musky, and there are at least 5 lakes within 30 miles of our hotel that hold muskie - also the state record is over 42lbs, so there is potential for 50+ incher!  Im gonna try and meeet up with Ric if possible - I'd love to get soem stiped bass!
I've done a lot of fishing in Jerzee!  Just check out my profile picture - it "BLUES" or "BLUEFISH" I've also done some STRIPE BASS, FLOUNDER, and PORGY fishing!
Mepps,  We ALL would love to see a trip report with  Mr. DeLaCruze, and the whole Mepps fambly.  I think there are some new additions about ready for their cameo.  Mr. DeMille.......
